name: Console Construct
description:
Console Construct is a game about a company that develops handheld gaming consoles. Research new technologies and build the ultimate gaming console, produce and sell your console, use the profits to research new technologies, and most importantly, destroy those buggy, evil consoles before they're out the door!

Controls:

  • Left Click -> Select menu item, place module (design mode)
  • Right Click -> Rotate module (design mode)
  • A/Left, D/Right -> Move left and right (QA mode)
  • Space/Down -> Shoot (QA mode)
